statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData;
SELECT location, demand_kW FROM EnergyDemandData;
SELECT timestamp, demand_kW FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE demand_kW > 1000;
SELECT location, timestamp, demand_kW FROM EnergyDemandData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, SUM(demand_kW) AS total_demand FROM EnergyDemandData GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE demand_kW > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE demand_kW > 500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT AVG(demand_kW) AS average_demand, MAX(demand_kW) AS max_demand FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, demand_value FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY demand_value ASC;
SELECT timestamp, demand_value FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM GridOperators WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT operator_name, location FROM GridOperators ORDER BY operator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT operator_name, location FROM GridOperators WHERE location ILIKE '%California%' ORDER BY operator_name ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY demand_value DESC;
SELECT operator_name, COUNT(*) AS num_operators FROM GridOperators GROUP BY operator_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT operator_name, location FROM GridOperators WHERE operator_name LIKE 'E%' OR location LIKE '%City' ORDER BY location ASC, operator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Smart_Grid_Operators;
SELECT operator_name, location FROM Smart_Grid_Operators ORDER BY operator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Demand_Data WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT operator_name, location FROM Smart_Grid_Operators WHERE operator_name ILIKE 'A%';
SELECT SUM(demand_value) AS total_demand FROM Energy_Demand_Data;
SELECT * FROM Smart_Grid_Operators;
SELECT operator_name, location FROM Smart_Grid_Operators WHERE grid_operator_id = 1;
SELECT operator_name, location, timestamp FROM Smart_Grid_Operators JOIN Energy_Demand_Data ON Smart_Grid_Operators.grid_operator_id = Energy_Demand_Data.grid_operator_id;

SELECT operator_name, efficiency_rating, timestamp FROM Smart_Grid_Operators JOIN Distribution_Efficiency ON Smart_Grid_Operators.grid_operator_id = Distribution_Efficiency.grid_operator_id WHERE Distribution_Efficiency.efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT operator_name, AVG(demand_value) AS average_demand FROM Smart_Grid_Operators JOIN Energy_Demand_Data ON Smart_Grid_Operators.grid_operator_id = Energy_Demand_Data.grid_operator_id GROUP BY operator_name HAVING AVG(demand_value) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers;
SELECT consumer_name, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE energy_usage > 500;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders ORDER BY energy_capacity DESC;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM EnergyProviders WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT consumer_name, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE consumer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers;
SELECT consumer_name, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumers ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT provider_name, location, energy_capacity FROM EnergyProviders WHERE energy_capacity > 1000;
SELECT consumer_name, provider_name, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM EnergyConsumers JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyTransactions.consumer_id;

SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyDistribution ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyDistribution.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_energy DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, demand FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
SELECT * FROM Operators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT id, timestamp, analysis_result FROM AnalysisResults ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandData WHERE location_id = 5 AND demand > 100 ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT EDD.id, EDD.timestamp, L.name AS location_name, EDD.demand FROM EnergyDemandData EDD JOIN Locations L ON EDD.location_id = L.id WHERE EDD.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT O.name, O.email, D.timestamp, D.capacity FROM Operators O JOIN DistributionData D ON O.id = D.location_id WHERE D.capacity < 5000 ORDER BY D.timestamp DESC;
SELECT AR.location_id, AR.timestamp, AR.analysis_result->>'key' AS result_key FROM AnalysisResults AR WHERE AR.analysis_result->>'status' = 'completed' ORDER BY AR.timestamp ASC;
